staff: 中文名:黑袍纠察队 第二季
主演:Karl Urban、福原かれん、Jack Quaid
原作:The Boys by Garth Ennis & Darick Robertson
story: Ahead of its series premiere next week, Amazon has given an early Season 2 renewal to its superhero drama series The Boys. The streaming network made the announcement Friday at San Diego Comic-Con. Additionally, Amazon confirmed that You’re the Worst alum Aya Cash will join the Season 2 cast as Stormfront.
